verses.verse: Think <S%H2803><s%> you this to be right <S%H4941><s%>, that you said <S%H559><s%>, My righteousness <S%H6664><s%> is more than God <S%H410><s%>'s?
For you said <S%H559><s%>, What advantage <S%H5532><s%> will it be unto you <S%H3276><s%>? and, What profit shall I have <S%H2403><s%>, if I be cleansed from my sin?
I will answer <S%H7725><s%> you <S%H7453><s%>, and your companions with you.
Look <S%H5027><s%> unto the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%>; and behold <S%H7789><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> which are higher than you <S%H1361><s%>.
If you sin <S%H2398><s%>, what do <S%H6466><s%> you against him <S%H6588><s%>? or if your transgressions be multiplied <S%H7231><s%>, what do you unto him <S%H6213><s%>?
If you be righteous <S%H6663><s%>, what give <S%H5414><s%> you him <S%H3947><s%>? or what receives he of your hand <S%H3027><s%>?
Your wickedness <S%H7562><s%> may hurt a man <S%H376><s%> as you are <S%H6666><s%>; and your righteousness may profit the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.

By reason of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of oppressions <S%H6217><s%> they make the oppressed to cry <S%H2199><s%>: they cry out <S%H7768><s%> by reason of the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the mighty <S%H7227><s%>.
But none says <S%H559><s%>, Where is God <S%H433><s%> my maker <S%H6213><s%>, who gives <S%H5414><s%> songs <S%H2158><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>;
Who teaches <S%H502><s%> us more than the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and makes us wiser <S%H2449><s%> than the birds <S%H5775><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>?
There they cry <S%H6817><s%>, but none gives answer <S%H6030><s%>, because <S%H6440><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of evil men <S%H7451><s%>.
Surely God <S%H410><s%> will not hear <S%H8085><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>, neither will the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> regard it <S%H7789><s%>.
Although <S%H637><s%> you say <S%H559><s%> you shall not see <S%H7789><s%> him <S%H1779><s%>, yet judgment is before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H2342><s%>; therefore trust you in him.
But now <S%H6485><s%>, because it is not so, he has visited in his anger <S%H639><s%>; yet he knows <S%H3045><s%> it not in great <S%H3966><s%> extremity <S%H6580><s%>:
Therefore does Job <S%H347><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> in vain <S%H1892><s%>; he multiplies <S%H3527><s%> words <S%H4405><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
